pageDesc: Discover our new range of PU Holds and Fiber Volumes.

paragraphs.name: name23
paragraphs.desc: Be it with the bigger more pinchy volumes to the smaller crimps, the shapes in the Stadium range will provide you a hold for every move.

paragraphs.name: name1
paragraphs.desc: Prepare for battle and step into the Stadium with your weapon of choice. Discover our new range of PU holds and fiberglass volumes, whether you prefer crimps, slopers, or jugs, our collection has it all.

paragraphs.name: name2
paragraphs.desc: These sleek blades and shields are both ergonomic and refined, offering a visually appealing design.

paragraphs.name: name3
paragraphs.quote: The collection also features a variety of jugs and some tricky dual-textured surfaces for added challenge. Choose from 115 PU holds and 10 fiberglass volumes (with a dual-texture option).

props.description:
For every inclination, every angle, any level.
You will find your fit in the Stadium range.
